text: Gallant Bess is a 1946 American World War II drama movie directed by Andrew Marton and starring George Tobias, Marshall Thompson, Clem Bevans, Chill Wills, Eddie Acuff. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 drama movies Category:1946 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Andrew Marton
title: Gallant Bess
